description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Pilot your way through this unique collection of performed short stories.  You drive a Moon Taxi and every passenger has a story to tell.  Collect dust and words to unlock the next fare and the next tale.  Stories were drawn from public submissions at moontaxi.org.
description.short: Pilot your way through this unique collection of performed short stories.  You drive a Moon Taxi and every passenger has a story to tell.  Collect dust and words to unlock the next fare and the next tale.  Stories were drawn from public submissions at moontaxi.org.
